description: The ritual of fidelity from EP1 is performed, where the guardians introduce themselves and bow. Then production credits play with some quick scenes between, and finally with Albedo doing a voice over promising to live up to the expectations of the 41 Supreme Beings of Ainz Ooal Gown.
